description: Detects suspicious SSH / SSHD error messages that indicate a fatal or suspicious error that could be caused by exploiting attempts
name: Suspicious OpenSSH Daemon Error
query: (*unexpected\ internal\ error* OR *unknown\ or\ unsupported\ key\ type* OR *invalid\ certificate\ signing\ key* OR *invalid\ elliptic\ curve\ value* OR *incorrect\ signature* OR *error\ in\ libcrypto* OR *unexpected\ bytes\ remain\ after\ decoding* OR *fatal\:\ buffer_get_string\:\ bad\ string* OR *Local\:\ crc32\ compensation\ attack* OR *bad\ client\ public\ DH\ value* OR *Corrupted\ MAC\ on\ input*)
author: Florian Roth
